# iFlytek Workflow MCP Server [The Model Context Protocol (MCP)](https://modelcontextprotocol.io/introduction) is an open protocol designed for effortless integration between LLM applications and external data sources or tools, offering a standardized framework to seamlessly provide LLMs with the context they require. This a simple implementation of an MCP server using iFlytek.
